'''Gilbert Keith Chesterton''' ([[29 May]] [[1874]] â€“ [[14 June]] [[1936]]) was a British author, poet, lay theologian, and literary and art critic. Chesterton is regarded by scholars such as [[Clyde S. Kilby]] as influential on the [[Inklings]].
